name: Hypnagogia
description: Close your eyes, open your heart. The original video was taken by me when I was doing my research on dreams and the related photo series Forgotten by the Day. The person in the frame was experiencing a modified dream machine, which claims to take you to an hypnagogic state of consciousness by consistently pulsating frequency range of 8 â€“ 13 flickers per second, and was originally designed by Ian Sommerville. It found its new form while dancing with the generative machine. Original sound by me.
